title: Bug 45145: Second window comes to front when using first
OB: When switching from another application to one Eclipse window, and then clicking on a docked view or perspective, the other window comes to the front over the windows of other applications. This behavior occurs regardless of whether the other window was clicked on intentionally or if a widget in the other window was interacted with.
EB: The expected behavior is that the only time a window should come to the front is if it is clicked on explicitly by the user, or if some behavior within the application requires focus to be shifted to a widget in the other window.
